data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Oran against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oran, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Oran, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Oran, Algeria.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Oran, Algeria today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,084,300 souls in Oran and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Berber, Mozabite people. Make the Berber, Mozabite people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 740 believers in Oran.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Oran, Algeria humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Oran, Algeria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
